alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 18 at 3:16PM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 50 mph creating blowing snow. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. * WHERE...Northern Houghton and Keweenaw Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is the potential for near blizzard conditions tonight. Travelers should remain vigilant for future forecasts and plan on extra time to reach their destination or consider adjusting their travel plans.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
